text: every time i walk past our local khachapuri stand i think bout all the convos overheard there - best unexpected people-watching spot 😌🥖💬
funky street art always brightens up alleyways here!
pretty wild how study spaces become like a second living room when working towards that degree... makes those community vibes super important when you're stretching every pennyric at home 🌆📚
Call me old-fashioned but nothing beats landmarks filled with childhood memories as true "home", even after moving out—smells from local bakeries beat hip coffee shops any day for me!
planning out life especially those $$$ details? blurrier than overplayed music video on mtv back when they did cool things & not just reality shows 👀
setting goals sounds neat until bills hit like ninja stars - plans need backup plans!
lol guess we're all just faking till we making
not everyone wants that predictable roadmap anyway - life's got more flavors than just vanilla!
admin jobs here totally get that too - respect seems optional...
super relatable! even doing clerical duties part-time while studying for urban planning—ideas fall flat till a guy steps up...it's more than annoying 🙄 strategizing every day here!
